featured.text: In fact, my life can be described as consisting of a series of “ups” and “downs.” 41.
Sherlock Holmes, a detective in a popular fiction series, has impressed readers with his amazing powers of _____ and his knowledge of trivial facts.
The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
The fire in the fireworks factory in Changhua set off a series of powerful _________ and killed four people.

other.text: People may choose a name because they are strongly 38 a character in a book or a television series; they may also adopt names of famous people or their favorite actors and actresses.
When a person died, his or her soul was thought to travel to an underworld, where it 17 a series of judgments before it could progress to a better life in the next world.

definition.zh_def: 一系列相關的事物或事件。
definition.en_def: A number of things or events of the same class coming one after another.
definition.example: I watched a new series on television last night.
